TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JsonDocument extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class JsonDocument Implements IDisposable
public ref class JsonDocument sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 提供用于检查 JSON 值的结构内容，而不自动实例化数据值的机制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for examining the structural content of a JSON value without automatically instantiating data values.

remarks.format: 此类利用来自共用内存的资源，将垃圾回收器（GC）的影响降至最低。This class utilizes resources from pooled memory to minimize the impact of the garbage collector (GC) in high-usage scenarios. 如果未能正确释放此对象，则不会将内存返回到池，这会增加跨框架各个部分的 GC 影响。Failure to properly dispose this object will result in the memory not being returned to the pool, which will increase GC impact across various parts of the framework. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何序列化和反序列化 JSON](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to#utf8jsonreader-utf8jsonwriter-and-jsondocument)。For more information, see [How to serialize and deserialize JSON](/dotnet/standard/serialization/system-text-json-how-to#utf8jsonreader-utf8jsonwriter-and-jsondocument).

summary.span: 释放该 实例使用的资源。

static member Parse : System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence<byte> * System.Text.Json.JsonDocumentOptions -> System.Text.Json.JsonDocument

param.name: utf8Json
param.span: 要分析的 JSON 文本。

span.span: The JSON text to parse.

param.name: options
param.span: 分析期间用于控制读取器行为的选项。

span.span: Options to control the reader behavior during parsing.

summary.span: 将表示单个 JSON 字节值的 UTF-8 编码文本形式的序列分析为 JsonDocument。

span.span: Parses a sequence as UTF-8-encoded text representing a single JSON byte value into a JsonDocument.

returns.span: JSON 值的 JsonDocument 表示。

span.span: A JsonDocument representation of the JSON value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用于 JsonDocument 对象的整个生存期，并且调用方必须确保其中的数据在对象生存期内不会更改。The may be used for the entire lifetime of the JsonDocument object, and the caller must ensure that the data therein does not change during the object lifetime. 由于输入被视为文本，因此不能出现 UTF-8 字节顺序标记（BOM）。Because the input is considered to be text, a UTF-8 Byte-Order-Mark (BOM) must not be present.

exception.span: 不表示有效的单个 JSON 值。

span.span: does not represent a valid single JSON value.
contains unsupported options.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Text.Json.JsonDocument ParseValue (ref System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader reader);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Text.Json.JsonDocument ParseValue(valuetype System.Text.Json.Utf8JsonReader& reader) cil managed
Public Shared Function ParseValue (ByRef reader As Utf8JsonReader) As JsonDocument
public: static System::Text::Json::JsonDocument ^ ParseValue(System::Text::Json::Utf8JsonReader % reader);
static member ParseValue : Utf8JsonReader -> System.Text.Json.JsonDocument

span.span: The reader to read.

summary.span: 通过提供的读取器分析一个 JSON 值（包括对象或数组）。

span.span: Parses one JSON value (including objects or arrays) from the provided reader.

returns.span: 表示从读取器中读取的值（和嵌套值）的 JsonDocument。

span.span: A JsonDocument representing the value (and nested values) read from the reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `reader` 的 属性为 或 ，则读取器将通过调用 前进来确定值的开头。If the property of `reader` is or , the reader will advance by one call to to determine the start of the value. 此方法完成后，`reader` 定位在 JSON 值中的最后一个标记上。Upon completion of this method, `reader` is positioned at the final token in the JSON value. 如果引发了异常，则读取器将重置为在调用方法时它所处的状态。If an exception is thrown, the reader is reset to the state it was in when the method was called. 此方法会创建读取器所处理的数据的副本，因此，不需要在返回此方法之后维护数据完整性。This method makes a copy of the data the reader acted on, so there is no caller requirement to maintain data integrity beyond the return of this method.

span.span: contains unsupported options.
-or-

exception.span: 当前 令牌不启动或表示值。

span.span: The current token does not start or represent a value.

exception.span: 无法从读取器中读取值。

span.span: A value could not be read from the reader.

param.span: 方法返回时，包含已分析的文档。

span.span: When the method returns, contains the parsed document.

summary.span: 尝试通过提供的读取器分析一个 JSON 值（包括对象或数组）。

span.span: Attempts to parse one JSON value (including objects or arrays) from the provided reader.

returns.span: 如果读取了值并将其分析为 JsonDocument，则为 ；如果读取器在分析时耗尽了数据，则为 。

span.span: if a value was read and parsed into a JsonDocument; if the reader ran out of data while parsing.

returns.span: 所有其他情况都会导致引发异常。

span.span: All other situations result in an exception being thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `reader` 的 属性为 或 ，则读取器将通过调用 前进来确定值的开头。If the property of `reader` is or , the reader will advance by one call to to determine the start of the value. 此方法完成后，`reader` 定位在 JSON 值中的最后一个标记上。Upon completion of this method, `reader` is positioned at the final token in the JSON value. 如果引发异常或返回 `false`，则读取器将重置为在调用方法时的状态。If an exception is thrown or `false` is returned, the reader is reset to the state it was in when the method was called. 此方法会创建读取器所处理的数据的副本，因此，不需要在返回此方法之后维护数据完整性。This method makes a copy of the data the reader acted on, so there is no caller requirement to maintain data integrity beyond the return of this method.

span.span: contains unsupported options.
-or-

exception.span: 当前 令牌不启动或表示值。

span.span: The current token does not start or represent a value.

exception.span: 无法从读取器中读取值。

span.span: A value could not be read from the reader.
